name: imupsam
author: AFNI Developers
description: Upsamples a 2D image by a specified factor

inputs.description: Upsampling factor; must be an integer in the range 2 to 30
inputs.name: Upsampling factor

inputs.description: Path of the input 2D image file
inputs.name: Input image file

inputs.description: Path of the output upsampled image file. Use '-' to write to stdout.
inputs.name: Output image file

inputs.description: Write the result in ASCII format: all numbers for the file are output, with no header info
inputs.name: ASCII output flag
